page.title: 13 Traffic Census in Wellow
page.content: 369 vehicles used the A36 in half an hour. 302 vehicles travelled straight through. The vehicles in order of importance:- Cars:225 Vans:34 Motor cycles:4 Pedal cycles:2 Lorries/Bus:0. Of the 57 vehicles turning off the A36 into Lower Common Road and Canada Road 44 were cars. The total of vehicles using Romsey Road,a minor through route linking Wellow residential areas,was 39 Car 33 Pedal Cycle 2 Motor Cycle 2 Van 2 The number of vehicles turning left and right off this road was 10.The A36 was the busiest route;most of the traffic passed straight through Wellow and very little went into or out of Wellow except for residents By Michelle Moran and Chantal Stokes.
